abstract.text: Make large-scale mathematical computations and image calculations, optimized for high performance and low energy consumption.
Multiply the pixel values of a buffer by scalar values or matrices.
Extract, flatten, permute, and overwrite the individual color channels of a pixel buffer.
Adjust the colors of an image by applying gamma, polynomials, or multidimensional lookup.

abstract.text: Reflect, shear, rotate, scale, and apply affine transforms to image data.

abstract.text: Composite two pixel buffers to create a single image.

Crop images and apply operations to regions of interest.

abstract.text: Convert pixel buffer data between interleaved and planar formats.
